Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz scored in the 25th minute to give Slovakia a 1-0 lead
Phil Foden scored in the 50th minute but was ruled offside
Jude Bellingham netted the equalizer in stoppage time with a bicycle kick
Harry Kane scored the winning goal in extra time
Post-Match Reflections: Jordan Pickford made several crucial saves to help England hold on to the lead in extra time
Declan Rice and Harry Kane missed opportunities to tie the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: England took a 2-1 lead over Slovakia after Harry Kane's header in extra time
Slovakia had several close calls, including a long shot attempt in the 55th minute
Jordan Pickford had a standout performance with multiple important saves
